title: not saying i didnt deserve the chat  restriction but..
body:
i wanna improve on how i interact with people in game without being reported by a bunch on snowflakes, this is how i speak both in game and irl im a very sarcastic snarky little asshole ill admit it but i also have a natural charm irl so people like me despite me being an ass sometimes, what im trying to say is its kinda hard to just turn into a robot and not show any emotions/allowed to get frustrated at a competitive game. some of you guys are pros at that shit idk how u do it but i just need tips on how to improve my "toxicity" if thats what some of you wanna call it.   


Game 1
Hells bellsX: my game is glitched

Hells bellsX: and his passive blocks sheilds
Hells bellsX: blocks tower shots i mean
Hells bellsX: go ahead, im dying either way cuz my team refuses to help me
Hells bellsX: so fuck uit
Hells bellsX: panth kept spawn killing me and my support wouldnt protect me so i can safely farm, everyone refused to help
Hells bellsX: so fuck this team
Hells bellsX: and fuck yall too
Hells bellsX: its not my fault that the game loaded me in with a black screen and i couldnt move or see anything
Hells bellsX: i tried to comeback by farming bot and helping the team,  but panth kept killing me over and over and i asked for someone to protect me while i farmed
Hells bellsX: multiple times
Hells bellsX: no one helped
Hells bellsX: i kept dying
Hells bellsX: so theyre not helping me
Hells bellsX: why should i give a hsitt
Hells bellsX: anymore
Hells bellsX: cant farm with panth ulting on me and using yomus to run at me and insta kill me
Hells bellsX: whatever
Hells bellsX: all u had to do was supp me while i farmed
Hells bellsX: it wasnt hard
Game 2
Hells bellsX: what the fuck
Hells bellsX: i just got a brand new computer
Hells bellsX: and these graphics
Hells bellsX: are the most horrible
Hells bellsX: ive ever seen
Hells bellsX: ever
Hells bellsX: i litterlaly cant play like this
Hells bellsX: imma need to take this computber back
Hells bellsX: and theres a dely
Hells bellsX: on everything i do
Hells bellsX: nvm
Hells bellsX: fixed
Hells bellsX: resolution was on the lowest setting
Hells bellsX: theres still a dely on my champ
Hells bellsX: how u gonna tell me

Hells bellsX: i was gonna kill him
Hells bellsX: then u come and Q
Hells bellsX: im done
Hells bellsX: gg
Hells bellsX: dont care
Hells bellsX: i love reportin toxic ppl :P
Hells bellsX: say it louder so riot can hear u ww
Hells bellsX: i do need to return this computer tho the game runs like garabge on this one
Hells bellsX: its just a game, dont cry guys
Hells bellsX: itll be ok ok ww
Hells bellsX: AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH
Hells bellsX: dont ks then :P
Hells bellsX: did u just
Hells bellsX: ASsuME mY geNDer???
Hells bellsX: if u cant carry this u deserve bronze ww
Hells bellsX: now carry away

Hells bellsX: typing
Hells bellsX: ezy
Hells bellsX: im actually doing yall a favor, this game runs so bad on this comp id probably be feding anyways if i were trying
Hells bellsX: after getting flammed? nahh
Hells bellsX: not gonna hlep someone that tells me to kms
Game 3
Hells bellsX: gonna ff?
Hells bellsX: 2 afk huh
Hells bellsX: lol

Hells bellsX: so ya thats ur fault

Hells bellsX: taking kills
Hells bellsX: yall are throwing the lead so hard

Hells bellsX: >.>

Hells bellsX: drag

Hells bellsX: keeps suiciding top side
Hells bellsX: u died idk how many times
Hells bellsX: whatever ur doing
Hells bellsX: its not working
Hells bellsX: so stop
Hells bellsX: coo
Hells bellsX: thats some true thirst right there lol
Hells bellsX: we got an inhib
Hells bellsX: so the smart thing to do would be group in one lane and put pressure on it so they dont reallt have time to protect bot
Hells bellsX: make them focus another lane
Hells bellsX: WE
Hells bellsX: COULD
Hells bellsX: EASILY

Hells bellsX: IF
Hells bellsX: YALL
Hells bellsX: WILL
Hells bellsX: GROUP

Hells bellsX: THE
Hells bellsX: HELL UP

Hells bellsX: GROUP
Hells bellsX: AND JUMP HIM
Hells bellsX: why is grouping so haed
Hells bellsX: we are literally losing becuase my team is absolutely refusing to group up and kill the ONLY person on ur team thats a threat
Hells bellsX: ive never seen a more bronze team
Hells bellsX: nawwwl talon
Hells bellsX: im afking
Hells bellsX: this team is giving me cancer
Hells bellsX: imma just afk to avoid popping a blood vessal dealing with them
Hells bellsX: 5 people 1 lane
Hells bellsX: its not complicated
Hells bellsX: liek come on
Hells bellsX: im done
Hells bellsX: gg
Hells bellsX: glad they decided to finally grow a brian
Hells bellsX: praise god
Hells bellsX: ur grouped
Hells bellsX: finally
Hells bellsX: now ill join
Hells bellsX: SEE HOW EASY IT WAS
Hells bellsX: THE MAGIC OF TEAM WORK
Hells bellsX: WOOOOOW
Hells bellsX: WHO WOULDA FUCKIN THOUGHT
Hells bellsX: casncell
Hells bellsX: too late



as i said, i can see why i got chat restricted im not denying that, i just wanna know how i can improve.
muting everyone is not an option for me because i might aswell play bots if i do that and thats not fun tbh, i just like trash talking, makes things more competitive and interesting.

replies.body:
realise that it's a game. There is no need to be overly hung up on win/loss.

If you are at the MMR you are meant to be, you would have a 50% winrate. 

Win some, loose some, bad team mates will be on your team, bad team mates will be on the enemy team.

Relax on your desire to HAVE to get a win and it'll probably do you some good for the future.

I mean, I think I would just suggest not typing a book.  It'll probly help your gameplay alot too. :p

Beside that, maybe just focus on your play rather than everyone else's.  I know it's tempting to want to try and micromanage them, but ultimately the only way for you to be better is to focus on yourself.  Unless it's something obvious like helping a Jhin figure out his ult or something.

Limit your in-game communication to strategy and encouragement. Arguing with your team, regardless of who is right, is pointless. 

And jeez, just talk less in general. Your every single thought, about your computer graphics or whatever, isn't helping anybody.

>Hells bellsX: %%%%% a ward aint gonna do shitt to a panth running at me at 40 mph

you used something that was %-ed out. This tends to mean you used some zero tolerance policy word. I'm kinda surprised you didn't get an elevated 14 day temp ban.

> [{quoted}](name=YerroFever,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=M1zHLoIu,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-02-26T18:37:08.533+0000)
>
> you used something that was %-ed out. This tends to mean you used some zero tolerance policy word. I'm kinda surprised you didn't get an elevated 14 day temp ban.

i used the N word but im black so you know...we say it irl to each other like all the time so sometimes when im playing league it just comes out. but ik riot doesn't know that so i understand why its automatically a racial slur
You're lucky. That shit usually escalates you to a 14-day ban, minimum.

> [{quoted}](name=Jo0o,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=M1zHLoIu,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2018-02-26T19:24:55.377+0000)
>
> You're lucky. That shit usually escalates you to a 14-day ban, minimum.

Looks like the IFS is learning colloquial phrases and context of using reclaimed slurs.... though will this now lead to a lot of false negatives when people try to mask the slur or was this reviewed by a person after IFS?

I don't think that's safe to assume from one log, but it's an interesting possibility. Tough call to make. OP was clearly not being aggressive or antagonistic with his use of the word, but many people would reasonably regard it as extremely disrespectful even in this context. 

They're still toxic logs, of course.

Lol, you berate your team constantly and are so whiny. This isn't being sarcastic. This is being a toxic asshole.

You just gotta be really reallly cautious(hint it's not fun) of what you say IN GAME CHAT,(take it outside on another chat,mic network) the Terms of Service is brutal, so you can't berate anyone but yourself and mobs like minions,gromp and even some items, you can't say stuff like report so and so, or I'm afking, and like the Miranda rights you are given anything you said can and will be used against you as they are generally taken out of context especially in word forms since people have a hard time telling what emotions or vibe it gives, only some1 that has experienced such will know what's up and let you go while the rest, ehhhhh in the gray area leaning toward to giving you a big fat report.
I don't see how your chat qualifies as sarcasm. If you spoke like that around me in real life we wouldn't be friends, if you were an employee on my team I'd fire you for inappropriate behavior.

Stop blaming teammates and recognize your own issues.....would you flame your midlaner if they constantly dc'd and cost a huge portion of the game....cuz that's what you did. Then you blamed others for your problems.......it may not be your fault for having dc but you only made it worse for yourself....nobodys gonna wanna help you dude
